front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Standard Requirements, Terminology, and Test Code for Step-Voltage Regulators

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Description of design types, tables of 50 and 60 Hz ratings, supplementary ratings, construction and available accessories are provided. Methods for performing routine and design tests applicable to liquid-immersed single and three-phase step-voltage regulators are described. This standard covers resistance measurements, polarity tests, power factor and megger tests, ratio tests, no load loss and excitation current measurements, impedance and load loss measurements, dielectric tests, temperature tests, routine and design impulse tests, short-circuit tests, control tests, calculated data and certified test data.
